message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe will be highly valuable to you. Given its potential, I'm offering it at $1,400,000. I think this is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring to your operations.

I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your perspective and willingness to negotiate. While I understand your position, the value of this product for someone like you is undeniable. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,350,000.  I believe this price reflects a fair compromise for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,300,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
